Food Trucks by Firelight

Heber City is hosting “Food Trucks by Firelight” at City Hall every Friday & Saturday nights from 5pm-9pm, and Monday nights from 5pm-8pm, in front of the fire pit.

Come and join #lolasstreetkitchen and #cucinarustico for some of the best food in the valley.
